mapper.insert: insert into t_mark (m_id, s_id, mem_id, m_point, m_detail) values (seq_m_id.nextval, #{s_id}, #{mem_id}, #{m_point}, #{m_detail})
mapper.select: select * from t_mark t, t_member m where t.mem_id = m.mem_id and s_id = #{s_id} order by m_id asc
select count(*) from t_mark where s_id = #{s_id}
select avg(m_point) from t_mark where s_id = #{s_id}
